prompts.title: Understanding Real Estate Basics
prompts.description: Generate content that explains the fundamental concepts of real estate, including property types, market dynamics, and investment strategies.

prompts.title: Real Estate Market Analysis
prompts.description: Create a detailed analysis of current real estate market trends, including pricing, demand, and economic factors influencing the market.

prompts.title: Property Valuation Techniques
prompts.description: Outline various methods for valuing properties, such as comparative market analysis, income approach, and cost approach.

prompts.title: Real Estate Investment Strategies
prompts.description: Discuss different investment strategies in real estate, including buy-and-hold, flipping, and rental properties.

prompts.title: Legal Aspects of Real Estate
prompts.description: Provide an overview of the legal considerations in real estate transactions, including contracts, disclosures, and zoning laws.

prompts.title: Sustainable Real Estate Practices
prompts.description: Generate content on sustainable practices in real estate development and management, focusing on environmental impact and energy efficiency.
